page.title: 06Mobile Services,Stevington
page.content: As there are many people in Stevington who do not have transport,the mobile services play an important part in village life.The mobile library visits the centre of the village regularly as do the chiropody service and baby clinic.Milk and other dairy products are delivered daily to our doors and a butcher delivers weekly.As there is no mains gas,the calor gas and coal lorries and oil tankers are often seen in the village.Logs are delivered to homes with wood burning stoves and open fires.In the summer an ice cream van makes daily visits and a frozen food company has recently started a delivery service.For those houses not connected to the main sewer a sewage removal tanker calls to empty their cess pits.
